StepParameter.Name: storekind
StepParameter.CommandText: select * from member_product where plat = 1 and productCategory = 1 and status = 1 and tag like '%,1,%' and startTime <= now() and endTime > now() order by lastUpdateTime desc limit 0,10

StepParameter.Name: storekind
StepParameter.CommandText: select * from member_product where plat = 1 and productCategory = 2 and status = 1 and tag like '%,1,%' and startTime <= now() and endTime > now() order by lastUpdateTime desc limit 0,10

StepParameter.Name: storekind
StepParameter.CommandText: select * from member_product where plat = 1 and productCategory = 3 and status = 1 and tag like '%,1,%' and startTime <= now() and endTime > now() order by lastUpdateTime desc limit 0,10

StepParameter.Name: storekind
StepParameter.CommandText: select * from member_product where plat = 1 and productCategory = 4 and status = 1 and tag like '%,1,%' and startTime <= now() and endTime > now() order by lastUpdateTime desc limit 0,10

StepParameter.Name: storekind
StepParameter.CommandText: select * from member_product where plat = 1 and productCategory = 1 and firstLetter in('A','B','C') and status = 1 and tag like '%,1,%' and startTime <= now() and endTime >now() order by createTime desc limit 0,10

StepParameter.Name: storeQueryHistory
StepParameter.CommandText: SELECT (select count(*) from `member_order_20141` where userid = 441267695 ) as totalElements,id, orderId, sourceAmount, amount, LTRIM( Currency ) AS currency, payName, returnAttach, bankOid, orderStatus, UNIX_TIMESTAMP( createTime ) AS createTime, UNIX_TIMESTAMP( backTime ) AS backTime, UNIX_TIMESTAMP( updateTime ) AS updateTime, userId, userName, storeName, memberType, applyType, buyMonth, uuid FROM `member_order_20141` where userid = 441267695 ORDER BY `member_order_20141`.`id` DESC limit 1

StepParameter.Name: adTypejdbcConnect
StepParameter.CommandText: SELECT t2.adId, t2.tagtype, t2.adname AS adName, t2.adcontent AS adContent, adTitle, adDesc, t2.pageUrl, t2.imageUrl, t2.titletype AS titleType FROM ( SELECT t1.adId, t1.tagtype, t1.adname AS adName, t1.adcontent AS adContent, t1.name AS adTitle, t1.descrit AS adDesc, t1.pageUrl, t1.imageUrl, t1.titletype AS titleType FROM admin_ad_info t1 WHERE t1.tagtype = tagtypePar and uptime <= uptimePar ORDER BY t1.adId ASC, t1.updateTime DESC )t2 GROUP BY t2.adId, t2.tagtype

StepParameter.Name: scorejdbcConnect
StepParameter.CommandText: SELECT * FROM `member_growth_log` WHERE username = '#lyj04' ORDER BY `id` DESC limit 10

StepParameter.Name: scorejdbcConnect
StepParameter.CommandText: SELECT * FROM `member_score_log` WHERE username = '#lyj04' ORDER BY `id` DESC limit 10

StepParameter.Name: scorejdbcConnect_new
StepParameter.CommandText: SELECT * FROM `member_score_change_log` WHERE username = '#lyj04' ORDER BY `id` DESC limit 10

StepParameter.Name: ajaxLotteryProduct01
StepParameter.CommandText: select * from member_lottery_product where plat = 1 and status = 1 and tag like '%,3,%' and startTime <= now() and endTime > now() order by lastUpdateTime desc limit 0,10
